project.name: J-C209A-ELAS-08-ST02-DT03-DF11-CF20-01
project.description: This test attempts to insert a new record into a MySQL database. In the event of a SQLException during execution of the insert command, diagnostic information about the database connection and SQL statement will be dumped to the output stream.
